sentences: Relvade kasutamine on keelitud selles piirkonnas.
Ta kogus relvade juurde ja läks lahingusse.
context: "Relvade" is the plural form of the Estonian word "relv", which means "weapon" or "arm". The suffix "-de" indicates that this is the plural form, referring to multiple weapons or arms. In Estonian grammar, nouns ending in certain consonants often add "-de" in the plural case.
